body_html:
@Johnson145 interesting. Do you really mean that you literally see "ld: unknown option: --icf=all" on Ubuntu 16.04? That's weird. We got the message on OS X because Apple has its own ld (neither GNU ld nor gold) and the Apple ld doesn't support --icf. On Ubuntu 16.04,

bazel build --config opt --cxxopt=-std=c++11 //tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/label_image:label_image

should just work.
body:
@Johnson145 interesting. Do you really mean that you literally see "ld: unknown option: --icf=all" on Ubuntu 16.04? That's weird. We got the message on OS X because Apple has its own [ld](https://opensource.apple.com/source/ld64/) (neither GNU ld  nor gold) and the Apple ld doesn't support `--icf`. On Ubuntu 16.04,

```
bazel build --config opt --cxxopt=-std=c++11 //tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/label_image:label_image
```
should just work.
